verse.gurmukhi: pUrw siqguru jwxIAY pUry pUrw Twtu bxwieAw[
verse.unicode: ਪੂਰਾ ਸਤਿਗੁਰੁ ਜਾਣੀਐ ਪੂਰੇ ਪੂਰਾ ਠਾਟੁ ਬਣਾਇਆ।

en.bdb: The perfect true Guru is known in his majestic form.

transliteration.english: pooraa satigur jaaneeaai poore pooraa ThaaT banaiaa|
transliteration.hindi: पूरा सतिगुरु जाणीऐ पूरे पूरा ठाटु बणाइआ।
transliteration.en: pooraa satigur jaaneeaai poore pooraa ThaaT banaiaa|
transliteration.hi: पूरा सतिगुरु जाणीऐ पूरे पूरा ठाटु बणाइआ।
transliteration.ipa: purɑ sət̪ɪGʊr d͡ʒɑɳiæ pure purɑ ʈʰɑʈ bəɳɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: پُورا ستگر جاݨیِاَے پُورے پُورا ٹھاٹ بݨاایا۔

verse.gurmukhi: pUry pUrw qolu hY GtY n vDY Gtwie vDwieAw[
verse.unicode: ਪੂਰੇ ਪੂਰਾ ਤੋਲੁ ਹੈ ਘਟੈ ਨ ਵਧੈ ਘਟਾਇ ਵਧਾਇਆ।

en.bdb: Perfect is the justice of the perfect Guru to which nothing can be added nor reduced from.

transliteration.english: poore pooraa tol hai ghaTai na vadhai ghaTai vadhaiaa|
transliteration.hindi: पूरे पूरा तोलु है घटै न वधै घटाइ वधाइआ।
transliteration.en: poore pooraa tol hai ghaTai na vadhai ghaTai vadhaiaa|
transliteration.hi: पूरे पूरा तोलु है घटै न वधै घटाइ वधाइआ।
transliteration.ipa: pure purɑ t̪ɔl hæ Gʰəʈæ nə ʋət̪ə̀æ Gʰəʈɑeɪ ʋət̪ɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: پُورے پُورا تول هَے گھٹَے ن ودھَے گھٹاا ودھاایا۔

verse.gurmukhi: pUry pUrI miq hY horsu puiC n mqw pkwieAw[
verse.unicode: ਪੂਰੇ ਪੂਰੀ ਮਤਿ ਹੈ ਹੋਰਸੁ ਪੁਛਿ ਨ ਮਤਾ ਪਕਾਇਆ।

en.bdb: The wisdom of the perfect Guru is perfect and he makes up his mind with out asking for other's counsel .

transliteration.english: poore pooree mat hai horas puchh na mataa pakaiaa|
transliteration.hindi: पूरे पूरी मति है होरसु पुछि न मता पकाइआ।
transliteration.en: poore pooree mat hai horas puchh na mataa pakaiaa|
transliteration.hi: पूरे पूरी मति है होरसु पुछि न मता पकाइआ।
transliteration.ipa: pure puri mət̪ hæ hɔrəs pʊɕ nə mət̪ɑ pəkɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: پُورے پُوریِ مت هَے هورس پُچھ ن متا پکاایا۔

verse.gurmukhi: pUry pUrw mMqu hY pUrw bcnu n tlY tlwieAw[
verse.unicode: ਪੂਰੇ ਪੂਰਾ ਮੰਤੁ ਹੈ ਪੂਰਾ ਬਚਨੁ ਨ ਟਲੈ ਟਲਾਇਆ।

en.bdb: The mantra of the perfect is perfect and his command cannot be avoided.

transliteration.english: poore pooraa ma(n)t hai pooraa bachan na Talai Talaiaa|
transliteration.hindi: पूरे पूरा मंतु है पूरा बचनु न टलै टलाइआ।
transliteration.en: poore pooraa ma(n)t hai pooraa bachan na Talai Talaiaa|
transliteration.hi: पूरे पूरा मंतु है पूरा बचनु न टलै टलाइआ।
transliteration.ipa: pure purɑ məŋt̪ hæ purɑ bət͡ʃən nə ʈəlæ ʈəlɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: پُورے پُورا مںت هَے پُورا بچن ن ٹلَے ٹلاایا۔

verse.gurmukhi: sBy ieCw pUrIAw swDsMgiq imil pUrw pwieAw[
verse.unicode: ਸਭੇ ਇਛਾ ਪੂਰੀਆ ਸਾਧਸੰਗਤਿ ਮਿਲਿ ਪੂਰਾ ਪਾਇਆ।

en.bdb: All desires are fulfilled when joining the holy congregation, one meets the perfect Guru .

transliteration.english: sabhe ichhaa pooreeaa saadhasa(n)gat mil pooraa paiaa|
transliteration.hindi: सभे इछा पूरीआ साधसंगति मिलि पूरा पाइआ।
transliteration.en: sabhe ichhaa pooreeaa saadhasa(n)gat mil pooraa paiaa|
transliteration.hi: सभे इछा पूरीआ साधसंगति मिलि पूरा पाइआ।
transliteration.ipa: səɓe eɪɕɑ puriəɑ sɑt̪əsəŋGət̪ mɪl purɑ pɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: سبھے اچھا پُوریِآ سادھسںگت مل پُورا پاایا۔

verse.gurmukhi: vIh iekIh aulMiG kY piq pauVI cV@ih inj Gir AwieAw[
verse.unicode: ਵੀਹ ਇਕੀਹ ਉਲੰਘਿ ਕੈ ਪਤਿ ਪਉੜੀ ਚੜੑਹਿ ਨਿਜ ਘਰਿ ਆਇਆ।

en.bdb: Crossing all calculations the Guru has climbed the ladder of honour to reach his own loft.

transliteration.english: veeh ikeeh ula(n)gh kai pat pauRee chaR(h)h nij ghar aaiaa|
transliteration.hindi: वीह इकीह उलंघि कै पति पउड़ी चड़्ड़हि निज घरि आइआ।
transliteration.en: veeh ikeeh ula(n)gh kai pat pauRee chaR(h)h nij ghar aaiaa|
transliteration.hi: वीह इकीह उलंघि कै पति पउड़ी चड़्ड़हि निज घरि आइआ।
transliteration.ipa: ʋih eɪkih oʊləŋGʰə̀ kæ pət̪ poʊɽi t͡ʃəɽ@əh nɪd͡ʒ Gʰər əɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: ویِه اکیِه اُلںگھ کَے پت پاڑیِ چڑھه نج گھرِ آایا۔

en.bdb: Becoming perfect he has merged in that perfect Lord.
